title: Coming Clean
description:
John Ball, Shane Smith and Terri Mintz share true stories about Jobitron of Azeroth, an irresponsible father, and a friend of the friendless.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (John Ball, Miranda July, Shane Smith, Terri Mintz, The Clash, Wet, Fujiya & Miyagi, Kevin Allison)
